name: Dr. Rohit Garg
title: Director, MIT Moradabad
bio: Dr. Rohit Garg is a dedicated academic leader with over 21 years of teaching and research experience. He excels in curriculum design and innovative pedagogy, and through his dynamic leadership has elevated both educational standards and campus facilities, fostering excellence in student experiences.

name: Dr. Rajul Misra
title: HOD, EE Deptt.
bio: Dr. Rajul Misra brings over 26 years of expertise in electrical machines, with more than 25 peer-reviewed research publications. As Head of the Electrical Engineering Department, he champions cutting-edge research and academic excellence in power systems and machine design.

name: Dr. Manoj Kr. Singh
title: Associate Professor, CSE Deptt.
bio: Dr. Manoj Kr. Singh has over 18 years of experience specializing in hyperspectral image classification, and he has authored more than 25 research papers. His work drives advances in computational imaging and AI-driven analysis.

name: Dhairya Sarswat
title: Student, CSE Deptt.
bio: Dhairya Sarswat is a third-year CSE student with strong expertise in cybersecurity and Python programming. He actively contributes to campus tech initiatives and leads coding workshops for his peers.

name: Shashwat Shinghal
title: Student, CSE Deptt.
bio: Shashwat Shinghal is a third-year CSE student skilled in front-end development and IoT. He spearheads innovative projects that blend user-centric design with embedded systems.
